import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { MDBBadge, MDBBtn, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBIcon, MDBInput, MDBRow, MDBTable, MDBTableBody, MDBTableHead, MDBTooltip, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; import styles from "./MusicDashboard.module.css"; import { API_BASE_URL } from "../../config"; export default function MusicDashboard() { const isLoggedIn = localStorage.getItem("token") ? true : false; return (
{isLoggedIn && ( { localStorage.removeItem("token"); // Clear token from localStorage window.location.reload(); // Reload the page }} > Logout )}

Task List

{!isLoggedIn && (

Welcome to the Task Management App

Manage your tasks efficiently with our professional task management app.

Login Sign Up
)} {isLoggedIn}
); }
